name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (Fajar Y)
description:
You just built a House! but they don't seem to like it, I wonder what will they do next?

A Pixel art game where you play as the house keeper. The more damage you get, you also deal more damage!

A and D to move, Left click to attack.

My first game for the blackthornprod Game Jam!

Music By : Heatlybros.

Known Issues : Save Manager Wont Load A File On The First Launch, Play A Level And Then Go To Main Menu Should Fix It!
